body.name: Exercise Bike Stationary, CHAOKE Indoor Cycling Bike with Heavy Flywheel, Comfortable Seat Cushion, Silent Belt Drive, LCD Monitor for Home Gym Cardio Workout Training
features: 【Strong and Stable】CHAOKE exercise bike is made of thickened frame tube, which give this indoor cycling bike a rock solid build, overcomes the unsteady issue of most stationary bikes on the market. There was no shaking or squeaking whether you are riding standing or riding.

【100 Micro-adjustable Resistance】Resistance system gives you the experience of a realistic, real-road feeling. Simply turn the knob to increase or decrease the adjustment to the different levels that best suit you.Push down emergency brake will bring the indoor bike to an immediate stop.

【Make Exercise More Fun】The Digital Monitor will real-timely track and record your exercise time, speed, distance, calories, and pulse, so that you can know your progress and adjust your exercise plan in time. The Tablet mount allows your to follow your fitness courses or just enjoy movie or music when spinning.

【Fully Adjustable】The height of handle and seat are adjustable to fit those users with different heights (Recommended User Height: 4.8 ft - 6.1 ft). The toe-caged pedals are designed with adjustable straps, fit for different size feet well. All family members can join in the exercise today!

【Silent Ride】Riding on this spin bike can promote blood circulation and burn calories, and exercise your arm, waist, hip and leg muscles. Experience a smooth and quiet ride with the maintenance free belt drive system which allows you to workout without disturbing others.

【Customer First】 Every customer who purchases a CHAOKE exercise bike is entitled to a one-month free return and exchange guarantee, and we promise one year of free accessories replacement. Meeting customer needs is our service tenet. Please contact us with any questions, it is our pleasure to serve you.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: CHAOKE indoor exercise bike equipped with resistance system and silent belt drive for home cardio or gym workout.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Quality, excellent Performance
reviews.reviewText: It was easy to assemble when I recieved this item. It is very stable and hight is easily adjustable. Great add on to my home gym. The seat is also really comfortable. Really worth the money .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars good product, good quality, reasonable price!
reviews.reviewText: I am looking for some riding exercise bike for my parents, so that they can do some workout at home, instead of going to gym. I found this exercise bike is delivered so quickly. My dad took ~40min to assemble everything. the installation itself is pretty straightforward. Overall, this exercise bike is built in good quality material. Very sturdy and no worry to fall off or broken apart. No much noise while using. It is also quite compatible and does not take too much place. My parents are 5' and 5'10". The bike seat is adjustable to fit both of their heights, and legs. The hand grips are very comfortable. They have been using it for ~1wk. So far no any problem. They love the gift i chose!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exercise Bike CHAOKE Magnetic Resistance/Bike pad
reviews.reviewText: I'm in love with this Bike. You can set the resistance of the bike really easily and the bike doesn’t make no noise. The handlebars and seat is very comfortable and the seat can be easily adjusted. It has a monitor on the front that can record and present calories burned, time spent, distance bikes, current speed, pulse rate, and other helpful information. This is an excellent bike it peddles so smooth. I work for LA fitness as in spin instructor and I gotta say this bike is amazing.. Great, Sturdiness, Comfort, quality, adjustability, Ease of Assembly, Resistance is great. You definitely lose weight, pedals are adjustable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great bike- forget Peloton- stream workouts from YouTube!
reviews.reviewText: This bike was easy to put together(my 12 year old did it) and is a great bike for the price. It's a comfortable ride and very sturdy yet compact. The only downside is that we can't get the handlebars tight enough so they wobble a bit. It's an exciting workout using YouTube workouts and my heartrate is very elevated the whole time- better than running!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Performs better then it's cost.
reviews.reviewText: Several months ago I was actively searching for the cheapest spin bike that could somewhat replicate an outdoor bike and this is what I ended up buying. It's by no means high quality but it serves its basic function splendidly and has been very reliable. After almost seventy hours on the seat pushing the pedals, this is what I have to say.It arrived with every piece intact and accounted for and no cosmetic damage.Setup was very easy as all of the parts are basic and instructions are very clear.When putting it together I thought it might wobble but when riding it's actually quite stable.The components are a bit heavy but not to much for at most two people to handle, the wheels are hard plastic so I would be weary of damaging weak flooring while on the roll.I was able to adjust it to my body shape very easily and changing that isn't difficult at all.I find the seat very comfortable and its plastic device stand rather functional to be sure.The electronic measuring console isn't accurate at all but that doesn't matter for my purpose.Overall as a spin bike it performs higher then its cost and that says a lot with how expensive they are.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly as advertised
reviews.reviewText: I was nervous ordering excercise equipment online but it was easy to assemble and it's very good quality.Super quiet, comfortable and sturdy.I'm 5'6 285lbs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wow - what a great find!
reviews.reviewText: We were hesitant about getting an exercise bike because we thought we would have to shell out some serious money to get something we liked. We decided to go for this cycle and we are so glad we did. It's great!It is heavy, so it can be a bit tough to locate it the first time as you put it together, but it is very simple to assemble. Plus it comes with the tools you'll need to put it together along with the hardware. I never once venture to the garage for my better tools - no need to do so.It is compact, but it still good for my wife who is 5'2" and myself at 6'1". It it quick to adjust and it is very stable. Whisper quiet too. I could not even hear my wife using it at all while in the same room.It is very well made out of heavy duty materials and should hold up for a long time.RECOMMENDED!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this bike for my mom and I to use at home while watching TV. Shipping was fast, and we were both impressed with the quality of the materials in the bike. The bike itself is very sturdy and solid. The only pieces that are a bit lower/standard quality are the digital timer/calorie counter and the plastic clip-on stand for a phone/iPad. There's nothing wrong with those, they're just nothing special.I was able to put the bike together in about half-an-hour from the box - it was easy and all tools were provided.The bike has a large range with fine differences for resistance and is very easy to reach and adjust during use. The bike is very quiet - at low resistances it is almost silent, and only gets to a soft hiss at higher resistance.The pedals are nice metal pedals with adjustable 'baskets' for one's feet - personally I find those baskets annoying and so I just use the back side of the pedals (where they naturally hang, anyway, due to the weight of the baskets) and that works very well for me. I am not doing any extremely fast or high power spinning or anything like that, so I cannot say if the baskets would be more important with that kind of use.The seat is moderately comfortable - it is a little hard, but I have never found one that I didn't find hard with longer use, personally. Also, my mom and I are 5'3" and personally I wish the seat could be lowered about another inch, but this seems to be the way bikes are made in general - I find the same issue with all real bikes and realistic indoor bikes that aren't recumbent. Also it might be nice if the handlebars could go up about another inch for us short people. Still pretty comfortable.The height of the seat can be adjusted many inches, and it has a few inches of adjustment toward or away from the handlebars. The handlebars also have several inches of vertical adjustment possible.The heartrate monitor seems to work just fine but I haven't tried to compare it to another one for accuracy. I just ride for time, and adjust the resistance according to how I feel.Another thing I appreciate about this bike is that it has a pretty small footprint - it doesn't take up a lot of room and tucks into a corner easily. It can also be moved and has wheels on the front for that purpose. I would not suggest that an 85 year old with quite limited upper body strength do that because it does involve tipping the bike up on an end, but for the average user it is a piece of cake. The bike can also be moved just by sliding it around, especially if not on carpet.If you want a quiet, smaller, sturdy cardio machine at a lower price point, I don't think you can do better than this. I have purchased machines slightly under the price of this one before and the leveling up in quality with this one is huge compared to those.

reviews.reviewTitle: Rubber pedals in lieu of metal would be safer for older people.
reviews.reviewText: Overall a sturdy apparatus. Easy to use.Do not like metal pedals.Having difficulty changing monitor from miles to kilometres.Generally very satisfied with product.
This is a great bike to start off with.Price is great and does everything that is needed.Unit is really sturdy for a plus size man.
Me gusto mucho, los materiales se siente bien en lo que cabe y no hace ruido.Quizá la bicicleta eta algo sencilla pero por el precio está muy bien.Sin dudarlo la compraría de nuevo.

This bike is definitely worth the price & the quality is good based on pricing. I’m a beginner spinner and simply do it for enjoyment & fitness, if you are a professional you may want to invest into a higher quality bike. However, for the average individual looking to spin at home with convenience, this is for you! Super easy to put together, quick delivery time & great quality !
